abstract: United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia rejects the Federal Aviation Administration's ruling that the Cape Wind's project presents no hazard to aviation, signaling more delays for the nation's first offshore wind farm.
snippet: An appeals court on Friday rejected the Federal Aviation Administration’s ruling that the Cape Wind project’s turbines present no hazard to aviation.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court on Friday rejected the Federal Aviation Administration’s ruling that the Cape Wind project’s turbines present no hazard to aviation.
